pizzas.name: Cheese
pizzas.description: Seasoned tomato sauce and generous premium melting cheese on our signature crust.

pizzas.name: Veggie
pizzas.description: Seasoned tomato sauce topped with cheese, onions, mushrooms, green peppers and ripe tomatoes.

pizzas.name: Margherita
pizzas.description: Fresh house mozzarella, tomato sauce and fresh basil.

pizzas.name: Chicken Pesto
pizzas.description: House-made basil pesto with tender chicken breast and melted mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Hawaiian
pizzas.description: Pineapple and ham over seasoned tomato sauce and mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Ricotta Sausage
pizzas.description: House-made ricotta, Italian sausage and sweet onions with tomato sauce and mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Pepperoni
pizzas.description: Loaded with premium pepperoni slices over tomato sauce and mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Meat Lovers
pizzas.description: Pepperoni, Italian sausage and ham over rich tomato sauce and melted mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Seafood
pizzas.description: Shrimp, squid and crab over our tomato sauce topped with mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Truffle
pizzas.description: Champignon mushrooms and black truffles with extra virgin olive oil.

pizzas.name: Super Sampler
pizzas.description: Choose any 4 toppings on a single pizza. (Available for XL size only)

pastas.name: Beef Stroganoff
pastas.description: Tender slices of steak in a creamy mushroom and brandy sauce.

pastas.name: Chicken Parmigiana
pastas.description: Hand-breaded chicken topped with melted mozzarella and served with pasta of your choice.

pastas.name: Pork Bolognese 5 Layer Lasagna
pastas.description: Five layers of pasta with rich pork bolognese, basil oil and melted cheese.

pastas.name: Bacon Garlic & Chili
pastas.description: A bold and spicy Thai favorite made with crispy bacon, garlic, dried chilies, and fragrant Thai herbs. Best enjoyed with our fresh handmade pasta.

pastas.name: Drunken Noodles
pastas.description: A bold, spicy Thai street food classic stir-fried with garlic, chilies, Thai basil, and fresh vegetables. Paired with our fresh handmade pasta.

pastas.name: Pork Bolognese
pastas.description: Rich pork bolognese slow-cooked for deep flavor.

pastas.name: Creamy Carbonara
pastas.description: Crispy bacon, garlic, parmesan and high-quality cream for a velvety finish.

pastas.name: Pesto Pasta
pastas.description: Fresh basil pesto with garlic, parmesan and extra virgin olive oil.

pastas.name: Marinara
pastas.description: A rustic take on Italy’s beloved base tomato sauce, slow-simmered with garlic, onions, and herbs for a simple, bold flavor.

pastas.name: Rose’
pastas.description: Tangy rustic marinara elevated with high-quality cream for a smooth, sumptuous sauce with a hint of natural sweetness.

appetizers.name: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Toasted bread topped with juicy diced tomatoes, garlic and house-made pesto.

appetizers.name: Shrimp Scampi
appetizers.description: Tender shrimp sautéed in butter, garlic, olive oil and basil.

desserts.name: Carrot Cake
desserts.description: House-made carrot cake with cream cheese icing.

soups.name: Creamy Bacon Potato Soup
soups.description: Rich and velvety potato soup with crispy bacon and cheddar.

soups.name: Shrimp Bisque
soups.description: Creamy shrimp bisque simmered with herbs and a touch of white wine.

salads.name: Caesar Salad
salads.description: Crisp romaine tossed in house-made Caesar dressing with croutons and parmesan.

salads.name: Thousand Island Salad
salads.description: Crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes and seasonal veggies with house-made dressing.

salads.name: Italian Salad
salads.description: Fresh mixed salad with zesty Italian dressing.
